answers.answer: There was a young lady who mentioned eating watermelon for swelling.
Try elevating them above your heart.. how is your blood pressure?? Swelling is usually associated with higher blood pressure
compression stocking look it up the net on how to use it.

It may just be you need to put a couple pillows under your feet to elevate them above heart. But if it isnt helping with relieve have your blood pressure checked as well as urine. When protein leaks in urine (preeclampsia) it causes swelling that you grt very little relief from and it also causes high blood pressure. But if you have been moving a lot and on your feet swelling is normal and it may take a full day or a couple days of relaxing to get the swelling to go back down! Good luck to you!

question: My feet legs & ankles are swollen what can I do? I tried a soak & putting them up but no relief .
title: swelling
